authors.name: Alexander Comerford
bio:
Hi! I'm a Data Scientist living in New York. I spend most of my time
programming, reading, or trying to solve math problems. Other things I'm
interested in are juggling, Hebrew, and philosophy.
I love to write about ideas and solutions outside the norm that actually
work.
